classic.name: Denver Botanic Gardens
classic.description: Horticultural library at Denver Botanic Gardens including rare books, seed catalogs & other items.

classic.name: Coors Field
classic.description: 76-acre home of the Colorado Rockies with some seats offering views of the Rocky Mountains.

classic.name: Denver Museum of Nature & Science
classic.description: Movie theater chain known for presenting 3D films on a giant screen, including blockbusters.

classic.name: Denver Art Museum
classic.description: 2 buildings (the second designed by architect Daniel Libeskind) highlighting Western & regional art.

classic.name: The Denver Central Market
classic.description: Meat & fish counters plus a greengrocer, bakery,  pizzeria & much more in an airy marketplace.

classic.description: Wartime aircraft, WWII uniform collection & aviation art on the former site of Lowry Air Force Base.

classic.name: Molly Brown House Museum
classic.description: Titanic survivor "unsinkable" Molly Brown's 1889 mansion houses Victorian-era furnishings & art.

classic.name: Denver Zoo
classic.description: Sprawling facility with animal exhibits, shows & demonstrations, plus venues for eating & shopping.

classic.name: History Colorado Center
classic.description: Interactive museum showcasing state-history exhibits, lectures & more in an eco-friendly building.

foodie.description: Meat & fish counters plus a greengrocer, bakery,  pizzeria & much more in an airy marketplace.
